tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: All specialists are available at Smile Zone and Dr Priya is wonderful. She did my treatment planning and they executed the treatment properly within the timeline as I was flying back to Singapore and was worried if my work would be completed on time. Thank you Dr Priya and Smile Zone team!
Nicely adviced. Will wait for the surgery and post a detailed feedback. Overall, great to see doctors explanation and support.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Good doctor. Listens patiently and completed the treatment painlessly. I was never made to wait more than 10 minutes. Doctor explained the issue very well and gave advice to maintain my oral Heath. Definitely recommend.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I had a very bad experience with Dr priya verma.. if you need anything more than a root canal..you should reconsider visiting her.

My experience: i have 3 missing tooth on the left upper jaw and 1 missing tooth on the right upper jaw.. i visited her for dental implants on left upper jaw and bridge on right upper jaw. She recommended me to go for 2 dental implants on left side along with a bridge. As per her i also need sinus lift and bone grafting procedure on left side.. to start the process she did a bridge on right side first before starting the implants on left side. The bridge cost me 30k rs approx. immediately after the bridge i developed infection on one of those tooth.. then she told me that root canal on the bridge is not done properly so she will have to remove the bridge and now i have to go for implants on right side as well.. p.s she took 2 xray of the same tooth before starting the bridge *** *** ***** *** ******* ** ****** then she told me to stay on antibiotics for almost one year to complete my left side implants first.. * **** **** ********** ***** ******** ********* *** ******* *** *** **** ** ** * **** ** ***** ** *** ** *** **** ********* ** *** ******** ** **** ** *** ** **** *** *********** ***** ** **** *** **** ******* ********* **** **** **** ******** ***** * ****** ** **** ** ** ******** ** *** * ******** *** *** *** *** ** ** **** ********** ** *** * ******** ** ** **** **** ******* *** **** ******** ** ***** **** ********** ** **** **** *** *** ******** *** *** ****** ** *** *** ** **** ** ******* ** *** *** * ******** ***** ** ** ***** ***** ****** ** *** **** *** * ************ **** ********* **** ********* *** ****** ******* ** *** **** ******* ** ***** ***** *** *** ****** *** ** ***** ****** *** ***** ** *** **** ***** *** ****** *** ************* *** ********* ** ***** *** ** ********** **************** ************* **********
Charges very high
reply_text:
Mr Rashpinder Singh,  you forgot  to mention in this that the root canal was NOT done in our clinic.  You are blaming us for work done on your teeth by someone else. You came with multiple missing teeth and some root canals which had been done ELSEWHERE. You wanted a fixed bridge on the right side and we did an X-ray and informed you that the root canal has not been done properly and after the bridge, there is a probability of infection.This was informed to you BEFORE doing any procedure. YOU INSISTED on proceeding with the bridge since you did not want implants on that side . You were well aware that the tooth under the bridge may develop infection and the same was CLEARLY CONVEYED to you.After the bridge,  you developed symptoms in that tooth. We told you there was an infection there and you needed to extract the tooth .
We gave you antibiotics for 1 week ( 6 days) to be precise!) . Can you please clarify where we told you to take antibiotics for 1 year! This is absolutely ridiculous. Is there a prescription you have for antibiotics FOR 1 YEAR???
You are having an issue with a treatment done elsewhere which you tried to blame on us.(You also gave a very unfavourable feedback of your previous dentist saying how badly the work was done!!) We have done due diligence and informed you prior to treatment about the risk of infection.You insisted on going forward with it  as you did not want to spend on implants. Yet when the infection happened you blamed us despite knowing that we had warned you about this earlier.

review: RCT Crown came out, RCT was done with the doctor approx one yr before. Charged 500+1800 for fixing the crown back
reply_text: Dear Mr Shivkumar, your RCT and crown was done in August 2022. We give a warranty for crowns for breakage or damage for 10 years and replace it free of cost in such cases. However if patients have eaten something sticky and the crown comes out that is not within our control. To fix the crown back we use various adhesive cements and depending on that there is a charge for fixing the crown back . If it has come out immediately after fixing then we do not charge, however your crown was fixed almost  in 2022! Hope you understand.

review: *** ******* ***** ***** *** *********** Please do not go to dr.priya , *** ** **** **************! I asked her not hit my teeth cuz  it was paining a lot! Rather she started screaming!* **** *** **** **** She didn't explain my issues properly! Infact i told her that one of my tooth is infected! She was ignoring me and took 1150₹ *********** * @practo - please refund my money! **** **** *** ** ********** She kept me waiting for long time & after this experience i left that place and my sister also saw the bad behaviour! At last i purchased the medicine from a local store! ***** **** ***** ***** **** ** **** ******* *** *** ***** ***** *** * ****** **** she cannot treat her patient like this! I am very disturbed by her actions! *** ****** ***** **** *** **** *** ****** ** **** ** ** * ** **** * ********** *** **** * ** *** * **** please handle carefully as i already told her that i hv severe pain! *** *** ******** ****** ***** ******
reply_text:
Dear Prachi, sorry to hear you felt that way. You booked a consultation appointment from Practo so consultation charges of 500 have to be paid. Which clinic does not charge consultation charge please let us know! 
You said you were in pain , and we examined you promising we will not hit the tooth at all. We understand you were very fearful but we  told you to at least open your mouth so we can examine. Eventually you opened and  you had multiple issues and we recommended an OPG X-ray which was done. Your teeth were not touched as you were in pain.You had to wait till the X-ray report was ready and we informed you that as well. However without talking to the staff or even paying your X-ray charges, you walked out. Our staff had to run after you to call you for taking your prescription and then you paid the X-ray charges of 650 and spoke very rudely saying you have paid the money.  
Yet we called you multiple times, shared your X-ray and prescription. Yes, your issue was not explained properly because your consultation was not complete. You left before meeting the doctor , without seeing your Xray report we could not have given you aany advise or a proper treatment plan.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
Smile zone Dental clinic is a great dental clinic with a professional staff and hygienic environment. Dr. Verma is a friendly doctor who clarifies all doubts and is genuinely concerned about the patient.  She will take you through the entire process of what treatment you are about to undergo, which eases the anxiety levels almost to half.  She carries out her work perfectionism. Notably, Dr. Priya is a very experienced. 
Also, the place is very warm and welcoming and spotlessly clean and well maintained. The staff at the reception area are polite and efficient. 

Thank you doctor and team for taking care of me and my problem and dealing with it so nicely. :) 
All the best.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
context: Composite tooth filling,Root Canal Treatment (RCT),PULP Capping,
review:
*** ** *********** ********** Perfectionist at her work.

Last year i visited her for a temporary dental filling and for my mom's dental filling and capping. That moment itself i decided that she will be the only dentinst i gonna visit for my future needs too.

Generally i have seen my friends hating to go to dentist. And for me this was my first experience of RTC and i was extremely nervous.  But she comforted me so much before and during the RTC procedure that i did not even realize when it started and got over. The next sitting was for my dental filling and even that was so easy. It was over all a magical experience.

You hardly feel any pain or realize that there has been something done with ur teeth. Feels so normal. Even the filling is done so neatly that my mom was actually searching for which tooth its done. Such a neat work. 

Also if you take appointment then there is hardly any wait time. 

Thank You Doc. You are amazing. I recommend her 100%.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental Surgery,Crowns and Bridges Fixing,
review:
My father had several root canals to be done. In addition he also had to get crowns and bridges to be fixed to fill the gaps between several sets of teeth. One tooth that had been badly infected had to be extracted. 
Over a period of 1.5 months over several sittings he was able to get all of this done successfully. He is now able to chew all types of food normally after several years of suffering from recurring dental problems. 
The best part of the treatment:
- he had to face minimal pain during the process. Even the surgery (tooth extraction) was relatively smooth and the pain was minimal. 
- at every stage of the treatment Dr. Priya gave a detailed explanation of the process, the alternatives and the pros and cons of each alternative. This enabled us to make an informed choice about the line of treatment to choose. 
I would like to thank Dr. Priya and her team for treating my father with minimal discomfort to him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I was in acute pain in my tooth since the lockdown but was taking painkillers. Visited the dental clinic but was apprehensive. However the doctor explain ed my treatment options in detail and reassured me on all the precautions that they were following for covid. The staff were well trained and the clinic was spotlessly clean. All the staff were wearing protective equipment. My treatment was completed in a single sitting. I had slight discomfort after the treatment but I followed doctor's advice and took my painkillers. My experience was very good and would definitely recommend the clinic.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Doctor friendliness,
review:
Had a severe toothache during the lockdown. Was worried to visit a clinic during this time however the moment I entered the clinic I was reassured to see that they were following all recommended protocols. There was no waiting and the receptionist told me that they had adequate gap between appointments  to ensure  that there is no one waiting in the same room. A staff member was regularly wiping down all areas with a disinfectant. The doctor and assistant were wearing the personal protection equipment. I noticed that they discarded the PPE after my appointment. 
My root canal was completed in a single sitting and although the sitting was long I was comfortable. Doctor explained the instructions to be followed after the procedure very well.  Overall completely satisfied and highly recommend the clinic.

Very nice doctor. She explains very patiently. Especially she is highly recommended for kids.
Thanks

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very professional doctors in Smile Zone. Everyone is very polite and the clinic is very clean and well maintained.  I got a fantastic result! Except for the few stairs I had to climb, everything else was perfect 👌

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: A very patient and qualified set of doctors in this clinic. Dr Priya is a true professional who genuinely cares for her patients. She has been our family dentist for the last 12 years and I recommend her to everyone who needs dental care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The best dental experience ever. All the doctors are so patient and my work was done painlessly. I received call from the clinic next day to check if I had any pain. Very happy with the Doctor and the clinic. Highly recommend

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor is awesome. Treatment was done very well and highly appreciate her taking care. Highly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I went to Dr Priya for front teeth fillings. I was very unhappy with my earlier fillings. Doctor completed my fillings in two sittings and did a fabulous job. I am very happy with the treatment and love my smile! I definitely recommend Smile Zone Dental Speciality Centre.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very good experience with Dr Priya. Did some fillings and Invisialign treatment at Smile Zone. Am  very  satisfied and happy with the results.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Bestdental treatment experience I have had so far. Painless treatment and aesthetic fillings done nicely.Thank you Dr Priya and her team.

I had pain in my left molar tooth. Doctor took the X-Ray & explained that it’s because of Wisdom tooth. Advised for the surgery. Prescribed medicines for subsiding the pain.
She’s extremely polite & she explained the issue so well. She was listening to what I said, was not in a rush at all. I highly recommend her.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review: I had neglected my oral health for a long time and postponed treatment due to fear of pain. However, the doctors at smile zone attended to my problems in a very professional manner. Treatment plan was explained properly and executed within timeline given. Doctors are very caring and friendly. I recommend the doctor 👍👍

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Priya Verma has been my dentist for the past 6 or more years .
She  has been a professional in every sense of the term. Yet, I consider her a friend in the way she has interacted with me each time I have had to interact with her. She is patient in her  explanation of the problem and very candid in her options of the cure available.
I am very grateful to have found her as a new resident of Whitefield, and highly recommend her professionalism.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had been referred by a friend to Smile Zone. I am generally very scared of dental treatment but Dr Priya immediately put me at ease. She spent a long time explaining the procedure and answered all my questions patiently. Dr Priya and the oral surgeon did the surgery very well . I had minimal pain after surgery. Thank you Dr Priya! I am no longer as afraid of the dental chair as I was!

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,
review: A thorough professional. She examined and explained my dental problem in a very friendly and easy to understand manner. She does not talk from a position of superior knowledge as a dentist but comes down to patient’s level to explain, comfort and suggest options. Am highly satisfied with my visits to her clinic.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Dental Implant Fixing,Dental Crowns,RCT - Single Sitting,
review: Visited Dr Priya Verma for dental implants' fixing on my lower jaw for both sides' molars and also RCT including crowns on  front teeth. Dr Lokesh Babu and Dr Priya completed 5 nos of implants in one sitting, the procedure was carried out quite smoothly by them. You get a feeling that you are in expert hands. Though it was bit tiring to sit for such a long time but it was painless. I would recommend Dr Priya Verma's clinic for your dental issues.

I was bit skeptical about how my 6yrs old kid would maintain peace during her dental visit, but to my surprise whole staff and doctor managed it well enough and made my baby smile -"as their name" says. Kudos team. Would strongly recommend for others to pay a visit when needed.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I give all stars to the team at smile zone. **** **** ****** *** treatment done painlessly. They managed the appointments well and informed me of any delay prior to my appointment so I would not have to wait. Very happy with the quality of work done. Would definately recommend this doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have been visiting Smile Zone for nearly a decade now. My friend had introduced her to me & ever since I have been visiting Dr, Priya for all my dental issues ! She listens to all the problems & provides true guidance every single time. I am very satisfied with her & would highly recommend to all for any kind of dental issues !!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Wonderful ambience, extremely high standards of sterilization and autoclaving being ensured. Dr Priya and her team are most courteous with a very pleasant demeanor, especially very skilled and explain at great lengths the entire procedure that they are going to undertake. I would rate Smile Zone dental clinic as one of the best where I have been treated and without hesitation recommend it to anyone who needs dental care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor was friendly and had lot of patience. She dealt filling of cavity well. I went to get one filling done but she also checked the rest teeth and advised one more cavity also filled which I had not sensed. Happy about the service received and feeling much better also.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had a very good experience at smile zone. Appointment time is given and doctor had planned the procedure in advance. They made sure there was no one else waiting with me. They are taking all precautions for covid. All the doctors were wearing PPE.  Doctor is very gentle during treatment and took time to explained the home care measures post treatment. Will recommend the clinic.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
1) We just had our scaling done, and it was very expensive.  Just for initial consultation and scalling, it costed us Rs2000. ***** ** **** **** ** *** *****  ***** ****** ****** ** **** **** ** *****  *** ****** ******* *** ******  ************** ******** * *********  * *** **** *** *** *** ********** 

Do your own research before choosing Smile Dental
reply_text:
Dear Mr Chippagiri , our prices are fixed. You were informed of the consultation charges and  scaling cost prior to treatment. You were told this BEFORE treatment and charged accordingly. Besides that you asked for discount AFTER the treatment which was also given. You were 3 patients and 500 consultation was charged for only 1 patient. 
Our charges are in line with the quality of treatment we provide, the standards of sterlization we maintain and every patient is informed of the charges beforehand. It’s your choice whether you want to proceed with the treatment or not.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Staff was friendly and they were good with the appointment time. In the first sitting my treatment planning was done and the treatment was carried out in the next sitting. Treatment was painless and completed quickly. Will definitely recommend the doctor

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ***** ** *** ** *** **** **** * **** **** ** * *** ** *** **** **** ** *** ********** *** makes visit to a dentist less traumatic . She explains each procedure in details even before she starts ..is friendly n approachable . Most importantly ,she treats each of her patients with patience n kindness ,which am sure is not easy ! Thank you Dr. Priya and her efficient staff .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had a very pleasant experiance with the clinic. Staff is well trained and all safety protocols are being followed. Doctor explained the problem and discussed treatment options. Treatment was carried out smoothly and efficiently. Will recommend the Docter.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was in a lot of pain and anxious. Doctor's  was very gentle during examination and my problem was explained. Treatment was started immediately and during treatment I was painfree. after taking medication for 2 days I am feeling good now. No pain or discomfort. Will definately recommend Dr Priya.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: It was a good experience with the doctor and staff. I am generally very fearful of dental treatment but doctor explained each step as she was working and was very patient  as i took breaks between treatment. The procedure was almost painless and after that i was given proper instructions . Am really happy with the work done. Would definitely recommend Smile Zone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She was one of the most professional and yet friendly. She explained everything in detail. Moreover she was very caring and approachable. She herself called up multiple times to check for the patient. My wife (patient) had severe pain so when I called up the doctor, she suggested an alternate medicine which helped. Afterwards she herself called up to check if patient is doing better. Amazing ethics.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Dr. Priya was really helpful. I'm always afraid of dental work but she was so patient with me and the procedure was relatively quick. There was some pain but I suppose it's natural for some discomfort to occur with any such treatment. However I really appreciate how she explained everything and was so patient with me and my concerns.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My whole experience at the clinic was very good. Clinic is clean and well ventilated. Doctor listened to my problem carefully and started treatment after explaining treatment options properly. She is very gentle and sensitive to the patient's needs. Treatment was completed in two appointments. I was comfortable and satisfied with the care provided. When you visit Smile Zone you are in good hands!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: I have been visiting Dr Priya from the past 2 years. Doctor is very professional and what I like is that she does not give unnecessary medication. I was very happy to see all precautions being followed for covid. The staff is also very efficient and the clinic is very clean. My treatment was painless . Will definitely recommend Smile Zone clinic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Visited the clinic for removal of my wisdom tooth. As it happened during the lockdown, doctor prescribed me medication to get through 2 weeks.  Was apprehensive about the appointment but satisfied to see they are being extremely careful and taking all precautions.  Doctor was very reassuring and most importantly procedure was painless. Highly recommend!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
** ***** ** ** ********* ******** She explains the issue in a detailed manner and explains whatever is needed. During her treatment process also she explains the patient about the process. I am thoroughly satisfied with her treatment. She is highly recommended. 

Thanks Doc.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
context: Dental Fillings,Dental Examinations,Dental Cavity Filling,Dental Inlay,
review: Typically, it’s not pleasant to have somebody put tools into your mouth. But Dr. Priya Verma is most gentle, sensitive and kind in the way she helps the patient feel comfortable - always clearly communicating on what to expect - very “patient” friendly.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I am visiting Dr. Priya verma since almost 7 years. She listens to the problem well and never hurried to do any procedure, she spend ample amount of time to do any kind of treatment like filling /RCT/Scaling. Her treatments are not painful, even my son wish to get his dental problem fixed by her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

review: Identifying the problem and explaining in detail as to what procedure would be followed in simple terms aided with a sketch made helps tremendously in reducing the anxiety that is normally associated with dental treatment. The promptness in scheduling the subsequent appointment was also handled well. The adherence to hygiene and safety precautions was reassuring to say the least. Charged extra consultation fee in name of covid precautions which is not mentioned on the website. Asked to cancel practo appointment on reaching the clinic. Charged exorbitant amount *** * **** ***** *** ***** ** ******* ***** ** ****** **** the doctor charged 2500.
reply_text:
All patients are informed of our charges before treatment. Due to covid we are using new PPE kits for attending to each patient and taking the prescribed measures for which a nominal amount of 100 is charged to the patient only ONE time and not for repeat visits. This is for the safety of our patients and our staff. If there is a change in appointment timing the staff may tell you to cancel the appointment and rebook it for you at the allotted slot as we are working with restricted timings. 
Our charges are fixed keeping in mind the quality of care we provide, the materials and equipment used and qualification of our available consultants. You can choose to not take the treatment if you feel it is expensive. It is rather odd that after taking treatment you complain about the cost!

tags: Value for money,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Charges are way too high. 
For a single RCT, I have to pay 
500 for consultation, 
250 for disposables, 
7000 as RCT charges and then 
800 for filling after RCT. 
So total Rs. 8550 for one RCT, crown/cap extra.

Injection application for local anaesthesia was very painful. It still pains after one week. 

Dr. keeps on shouting on her staff. 
I am left with many painful sores in my mouth of the suction cannulae.

Overall, I won't recommend this Dr. to anyone.
reply_text:
Sorry to hear you feel that way. The charges are informed prior to treatment.  All patients know the charges before treatment is begun. And patient has the option whether to take the treatment or not.  Our prices are in line  with our skill,  experience level of the doctors , the quality of our equipment and the high level of sterlization that we maintain. You were informed of the consultation charge as well as RCT charges prior to treatment . Consultation charges are a one time charge for all new patients and are not charged at every visit.
Our policy regarding wait time is very clear .We see only with appointments. Patients in an emergency or severe pain are accomodated but that also not during pre fixed appointment times. However dental procedures can take time as we are dealing with the human body. If a patient inside the surgery is taking slightly more time,then a slightly longer waiting can happen. It is rarely more than 20-30 minutes. most patients understand that.

 The disposables are being used due to COVID precautions. We have to use a new PPE for each patient while doing aerosol work. Moreover the Root Canal needles used , even though sterlisable are not reused anymore, for safety of the patient as well as our staff. These cannot be compromised on for the safety of our patients as well as our staff.
 Root canal treatment can be painless or slightly painful depending on the condition of the tooth. Infected teeth can be slightly painful during treatment despite our best efforts. Pain can persist for a few days but is controlled if you follow instructions and take your medication properly. Moreover pain perception varies from patient to patient.
  We are working under conditions where all of us are wearing PPE , face shields and since doctors are wearing Full face Respirators our staff is unable to hear us when we talk. We have to speak louder for them to follow instructions. Since we are right next to the patient it is of course a little louder! In case we need materials during treatment we cannot remove the respirators and PPE kits. We have no option but to talk louder so as to give instructions.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I felt very comfortable consulting Dr Priya . tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I am totally satisfied with her treatment and she firstly explained full treatment to me that what she will do in her entire treatment. now I am feeling good and I Highly recommend Dr. Priya Verma to all to get your dental problem solution from her if you are in Whitefield.

tags: Wait time,
review: DO NOT visit! clinic is fully crowded with patients, poor hygiene. No regards for patients time or condition. Appointment time means nothing to them. ***** *********** *** *** ********* She allowed a patient without appointment just cause she wanted to whereas I was in pain and she kept me waiting at her clinic for more than an hour.
reply_text:
Very sorry to hear you feel that way. Our clinic is extremely hygenic and  we follow all precautions regarding Covid. No patient is checked without a fresh PPE kit and we carry out all the sanitisation procedures recommended after every single patient.  That in fact can lead to some delay. A patient already in the dental chair cannot be told to go out if there is a pain case waiting outside . Most importantly, I would like to point out that we are not an IT or service industry where SOP applies. In healthcare we deal with Human Beings. That is the  critical  difference. For example, a root canal treatment may take 30-45 mins . However in  certain cases it may take 1-2 hours also. These are unforseen one offs but they happen as we deal with people and not machines. Every patient is unique and requires treatment accordingly. Though we plan our time slots carefully, sometimes delays are possible. Rest assured when it is your turn,we will give you our full attention with complete dedication.We could prescribe an oral painkiller if the patient in the waiting area  is in too much pain. However a surgical procedure that is continuing cannot be stopped in the middle and most patients understand that. We cannot run out in our PPE kits to inform or take care of a patient in pain. As we are wearing respirators during working, we take a little time between patients. Although we have multiple dental chairs ,Only one patient is taken in the surgery at a time for safety precautions and we have to sanitise before taking you in. If that leads to delay it cannot be helped as it is the safety protocol.We do not see walk in patients so there is no question of seeing a non appointment patient before you. However there are times when a patient may come early or late leading to more patients. Our waiting and consultation areas are large enough to allow safe distancing.
Hope you can understand that we are working under these  constraints  and strive to take care of our patients to the best of our ability.

tags: Value for money,
review: 500 for consultation and 250 extra on the name of PPE kit , which wasn't either given to patient or Dr wore and no bill for that. **** ***** *** ** *** **** ** ************ *** *** ***
reply_text: Sorry you feel that way. PPE is used for the doctor and assistants for your protection , it is used and discarded appropriately as per safety protocol after every patient and cannot be “ given” to the patient. How can used and contaminated kits given back? They are disposed as hazardous biological waste.Receipt is provided to the patient for the entire charges paid by the patient including PPE kit. Usually it is sent on email and hard copy is provided if the patient asks for it. All doctors and assistants are wearing full PPE kit with N95 masks, face shield, head cap and gloves, changed after each patient and  the surgery is sanitised. Our staff is never in the clinic without wearing appropriate protection. We have to sanitize the clinic after each patient for the safety of our patients and our staff. Moreover though we have multiple chairs , we are now taking in only one patient at a time keeping in mind the safety of our patients. Everything used for each patient is new and disposed off after use. Instruments to be sterlised now undergo 3 levels of sterlization. That does involve extra expenditure which is borne partly by us and a small cost is passed on to the patient. Besides the consultation is a one time charge for new patients. All patients are informed of all charges PRIOR to the appointment .
